masterFinding.verificationInstructions:
Verification Instructions

Use forgot password functionality to access the page that requires security question answers (if available in the application).
  1. Try ten incorrect security question answers

  2. Try valid security question answer

  3. Mark vulnerable if password can be reset


The application does not have to lockout security questions but it should force the user to restart the password reset workflow after ten incorrect answers.

Reporting Requirements
  1. Show password reset functionality

  2. Screenshot Burp Intruder with ten incorrect answers

  3. Screenshot password reset after a valid security question answer.
masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Restrict the number of tries a user can attempt a password reset to no more than six.
masterFinding.name: Weak Password Reset - Unlimited Tries
masterFinding.businessImpact: An attacker could compromise the confidentiality and integrity of the user by compromising the credentials of the user.
masterFinding.description: The password reset functionality allows unlimited attempts to guess the correct secret question/answer combination.
